* Creates a new Deadlines object from the full deadline description that includes the deadline.

* Returns the String representation of the object.

* @return string representing a Deadlines task with a "[D]" identifier and the deadline at the back

* Represents a general Exception class of Exceptions that occur while DukeException is running.
* Creates a DukeException object with a customised error description.
* @param description description of the type of error encountered
* Events are tasks that we have to attend at a given time slot.
* timing of the event represented by a String
* String separator used to separate the task description and the timing
* Creates an Event object with the given event description and timing.
* @param taskDescription full description of the event including task and timing
* Returns the String representation of the object.
* Updated from the superclass Task to include the type of Task this object is and include the timing.
* @return returns a String representing an Event with a "[E]" identifier and timing
* Encapsulates a Task with a description.
* Task can be completed and will be mark as done.
* By default, it is initialised as incomplete.
* boolean flag indicating completion of the task
* Creates a new incomplete Task object.
* Creates a tick or cross String depending on whether the task is completed.
* @return tick if the task is completed, a cross otherwise
* Returns a String representation of the Task.
* @return String representing the task, showing its status and description.
* Encapsulates Tasks that are to be completed.
* Object only carries information about the task to be completed.

* Returns the String representation of the object.
* Updated from the superclass Task to include the type of Task this object is.
* @return string representing the ToDos task with a "[T]" identifier
